0.text: Bug 6191  Should be able to select contents of string.

1.text: In a previous version of Eclipse, and in VAJ, and in VAME, I could double-click  inside a Java string and select the whole string.

2.text: This is handy for replacing  the text in the string.

3.text: For example, if you have a string "This is a pretty long string and it is incorrect" then you could double-click in between the first " and the T or after the last t and before the end " and the whole string would be selected.

4.text: Currently, double-click only selects between brackets.

5.text: It should select  between "s as well.

6.text: Try it in VAJ or VAME to see what I mean.
